paragraphs: Found in the Hearthfire DLC. Italicized words are determined by the game.
<italic>[Jarl name], Jarl of [Capital city], to [Player name], [his/her] faithful friend; grant of the steading of Windstad Manor, near the Mouths of the Karth, north of Morthal.</italic>
<italic>Witnessed by [Steward name], Steward to Jarl [Jarl name], [day] [month], [year]</italic>
